data.title: Top 25 Pennsylvania-Based Record Label Companies
data.meta_description: Explore Pennsylvania's thriving music industry with the top 25 record label companies. Ranging from Hip Hop Weekly's genre-specific focus to 20 Buck Spin's underground music, there's a diverse landscape.
data.text:
The music industry of Pennsylvania includes various types of record label companies catering to diversified music genres. These businesses excel in artist management, music production, promotion, and distribution. They cater to a wide range of musical genres including hip hop, metal, pop, and many more. As the music industry evolves with digital transformation, these companies are also adapting by offering online services. The industry's future is likely to incorporate an even greater emphasis on digital distribution and promotion strategies.

Top 25 record label companies in Pennsylvania

1. Hip Hop Weekly

Website: hiphopweekly.com

Headquarters: Langhorne, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Hip Hop Weekly is a media company specializing in covering and promoting the entire hip hop culture. They provide news, music, style, and interviews related to the hip hop industry.

2. Buck Spin

Website: 20buckspin.com

Headquarters: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

20 Buck Spin is a record label and online record store that offers a variety of metal and underground music titles on vinyl, CDs, and tapes.

3. The Idol Kings

Website: idolkings.com

Headquarters: Wilkes Barre, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

Idol Kings is a company that offers various products and services related to music, specifically music production, distribution, and promotion.

4. Professor Pooch

Website: professorpooch.com

Headquarters: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

Professor Pooch's Music Business Education and Career Guidance. David J. Spangenberg - Guiding Creative, Business and Legal Music Careers for 35 Years.

5. Ntune Entertainment Group

Website: ntuneentgrp.com

Headquarters: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Ntune Entertainment Group is an independent artist label and promotion company that helps new artists succeed in a competitive market by providing creative and professional growth through extensive industry knowledge and connections.

6. Hyperboloid Records

Website: hyperboloidrecords.com

Headquarters: Mars, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

Hyperboloid Records is a music company based in Riga, Latvia. They release music which is a blend of electronic club music, both deconstructed and newly found inverted and transcended music genres, generally arranged under bass and experimental sections in music stores.

7. The Pier Magazine

Website: thepier.org

Headquarters: Pennsylvania Furnace, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 2007

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

The Pier is a website dedicated to reggae music news, interviews, features, and event coverage.

8. Millennium Music Conference

Website: musicconference.net

Headquarters: Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Millennium Music Conference & Showcase is the largest and most reputable annual music conference and showcase in the Mid-Atlantic region. Each year, hundreds of musicians and music industry professionals come together for this 2-day event featuring business panels, clinics, workshops, and keynotes. The event also includes evening performances showcasing new talent at select live music venues.

9. Kings Records

Website: kingrecords.net

Headquarters: Allentown, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 1931

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

King Records is a company that offers various products and services in the entertainment industry.

10. ASKM Publishing

Website: askmpublishing.com

Headquarters: Chester, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

ASKM Publishing is an independent music publishing company, started and founded in June 2009. It's an ASCAP affiliated music publishing company owned and operated by independent music publisher A'Ishah Karriem aka A'Ishah Songstress. ASKM Publishing specializes in artist ownership and creative control. The primary genres we focus on are R&B, Hip Hop, Soul and Urban Pop. However, ASKM is open to representing and working with all songwriters, composers and artists of all genres. I, A'Ishah Songstress am more than just an independent music publisher. I'm a songwriter, composer, pianist, vocalist, author, music historian and artist myself. I've been singing since 9 years old. I've been writing songs since I was 13 years old, which is the same year I decided to start studying the business side of music. I'm also a classically trained vocalist, although R&B music is my 1st love. I've been classically trained since 16 years old. The same age I learned music theory and started to compose music. One of the main reasons I decided to get into music publishing and start my own company was due to the constant ""no's"" I was receiving from established industry producers and managers when I would shop my demos. I noticed as long as I was viewed as an unknown songwriter and singer I would never make any progress. So I soon decided to join ASCAP, learn the business side of the industry and start a brand and company where my music would speak for itself, while also inspiring others. My vision at ASKM Publishing is to enable other songwriters, composers and artists with the proper tools and resources to prosper. This includes behind and in front of the scenes within the music industry. Although I advocate for being an independent music artist and controlling your own career, this also includes mainstream success.

11. Bell Tower Music

Website: belltowermusic.org

Headquarters: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Bell Tower Music is a student-run record label at Temple University that creates and distributes recordings and media featuring the music of Temple artists.

12. RCA Inspiration

Website: rcainspiration.com

Headquarters: Boyertown, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

The website rcainspiration.com offers gospel music and content related to gospel singers.

13. Fame House

Website: famehouse.net

Headquarters: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 2011

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Fame House is a company that offers a wide range of services in the field of marketing, advertising, management, public relations, record label, rights holder, social media, website, digital, and technology. They provide comprehensive solutions for clients, delivering high-quality work products.

14. LBMRecords

Website: lbmrecords.com

Headquarters: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 2018

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

LBMRecords is an independent Christian record label that provides resources and tools for musicians to take their careers to the next level by promoting their music to a wider audience.

15. TribeSound Records

Website: tribesoundrecords.com

Headquarters: West Chester, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

TribeSound Records is a high end analog + digital recording studio located in West Chester, PA just outside of Philadelphia. In addition to our professional recording studio we offer mastering, artist development, and indie record label support. TribeSound Productions is a music media production company that specializes in video, photography and web design.

16. Gone Postal Records

Website: gonepostalrecords.com

Headquarters: Reading, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 2013

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Gone Postal Records is an American electronic music label based in Reading, PA. Founded in 2013 by Jon Jordan, the label releases new music every Friday everywhere digital music can be downloaded or streamed including Spotify, Apple Music, Beatport, and Google Play. Originally promoting various genres, Gone Postal Records began promoting strictly electronic music in 2015. The label distributes and promotes a wide array of electronic sub-genres, including but not limited to: dubstep, house, trap, ambient, trance, and future bass. In 2017, Gone Postal Records coined its slogan: Pretty Gritty Electronic Music. The label aims to release a balance of electronic music - ranging in style and mood - in order to build an extensive catalog featuring something for every musical taste. In 2018, the label launched free promotional services for electronic music producers including its weekly online radio show, the Pretty Gritty Podcast. The same year, GPR began releasing new music every Friday. Currently, the label promotes over 400 up-and-coming electronic music producers per year through distribution and various promotional services.

17. Creative.Life Support

Website: creativelifesupport.com

Headquarters: Millvale, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

Creative.Life.Support Records is a non-profit record label offering artist development programs such as recording grants and financing to local and regional musicians to jump-start their careers and sustain their long-term visions as touring and recording artists.

18. August Burns Red

Website: augustburnsred.com

Headquarters: Manheim, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 11-50

August Burns Red is a music band that offers heavy metal and hardcore music for fans around the world.

19. Flexitone Records

Website: flexitonerecords.com

Headquarters: Gwynedd Valley, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

Founded by Grammy-nominated and multi-platinum engineer and producer David Ivory, Flexitone Records is an innovative music label based out of Philadelphia, PA. After being instrumental in the development and rise of Halestorm and Silvertide, David felt there was more he could do for the music he produced than just making it sound great. With that thought in mind, in 2012 David officially began bringing together what would become the Flexitone Records you have today. But Flexitone is not your typical music label...we operate in a slightly different and unique way. In the music business we live in today, it is all about one thing: the single. With this in mind, Flexitone approaches the industry by signing the song, not the artist. The singles our artists create are fantastic, and they deserve more attention and effort than the artists themselves can give them. And thats where Flexitone comes in - our mission is to represent the best tracks from the best independent regional, national, and international artists. Were the support system that specializes in guiding and promoting their single on a grassroots level. Our experience, combined with our in-house radio, publishing, and promotions team gives Flexitone the ability to provide our releases with the best exposure and promotion available.

20. Sardonyx Productions

Website: sardonyxproductions.com

Headquarters: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

In 2009, Sardonyx Productions produced the FIRST National Music Conference in Pittsburgh, featuring music professionals from around the country speaking at panel discussions and watching the local Pittsburgh artists! In attendance were a LEGENDARY record label executive, an extremely accomplished A & R consultant from Jive Records, another well-accomplished form A & R executive that worked at several record labels and managed Dream Theater, NSAI songwriters, well-known booking agents, managers, publicists and some great local (and regional) bands. 3 of those bands were offered DEALS from Jive Records after that night! 2010 was the 2nd National Music Conference, featuring a record label consultant from Atlantic Records, the promotions manager from the biggest indie label in the U.S., 2 fantastic producers from the West and East coasts, 2 entertainment attorneys and more! A musician in one of the bands featured at the music conference was offered the chance to audition in L.A. for Emphatic, signed by Atlantic Records, and he got the position! Also, musicians had the opportunity to sign up that day and play a song for the Atlantic consultant for a professional critique. Both conferences offered the chance for musicians and music business people to learn from some great professionals in the industry, which rarely if ever happens in this region. 2011 we started the Pittsburgh High School Rock Challenge, to motivate young musicians and help them reach some music goals. 2012 was the Erie High School Rock Challenge. Both events were huge in the music community, and we look forward to doing them again this year. Our other focus is to help GREAT bands to play in different cities, and give them exposure to many different audiences around the country. If your band wants a great opportunity to be a part of a Sardonyx Productions event, email us at info@sardonyxproductions.com, ""Like"" us on Facebook, or keep checking this site and FB for regular updates. We hope to meet you soon!

21. Philadelphia International Records

Website: gamble-huffmusic.com

Headquarters: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Gamble Huff Entertainment LLC is a company that operates in the Media and Entertainment industry. It employs 1-5 people and has $1M-$5M of revenue. The company is headquartered in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

22. POC Media, Inc.

Website: pocmedia.com

Headquarters: Wayne, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 1990

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

POC Media is an entertainment-based licensing and digital marketing organization that specializes in experiential marketing, event production, and entertainment industry support. They offer services such as digital marketing, search engine optimization, and online content development. With expertise in licensing, they secure revenue for IP companies, record labels, and publishers. Their clients range from sports broadcasting entities to global brands and advertising agencies.

23. MVD Entertainment Group

Website: mvdentertainment.com

Headquarters: Pottstown, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 1986

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

MVD Entertainment Group is a company specializing in delivering great audio and video content to brick and mortar, online retail, and digital/VOD platforms worldwide.

24. Cassus Records LLC

Website: cassusrecords.com

Headquarters: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States

Founded: 2019

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Cassus Records is a record label dedicated to promoting new musical artists in the U.S.

25. GigFaster

Website: gigfaster.com

Headquarters: Carlisle, Pennsylvania, United States

Headcount: 1-10

GigFaster is an online software platform where you can create your artist profile and submit to venues, music promoters and record labels.

Want to find more record label companies?

If you want to find more companies that focus on services such as music production, promotion, and distribution you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
